title.narrative: Consultancy for Development of Training Manual and Assessment of Policies and Legislations

description.narrative: Some of the activities under the project "Ensuring Effective Implementation of Programmes, Policies and Legislations, that Contribute Towards Achieving Gender Equality in Nigeria by 2030" include; Training of Legislators and Assessment of Policies and Legislations of Benue and Zamfara States to see how they have mainstreamed gender issues. Preparatory to this training and assessment which are scheduled to be achieved by the second and third quarter of 2017, WEP engaged Consultants to develop training manual for training of legislators and undertake assessment of policies and legislations in Benue and Zamfara States respectively. The training manual is expected to be completed by second quarter of 2017 while the assessment of legislations is expected to be completed by the third quarter of 2017.

participating-org.narrative: This project is funded by the Embassy of the Kingdom of Netherlands under the Netherlands Accountability Fund.

activity-date.narrative: The two consultancies were given out between February and March, 2017

recipient-country.narrative: These activities are to be implemented in Benue and Zamfara States of Nigeria
